metadata.feature_description: Track and display article view counts

steps.action: Navigate to Wiki Test page and view article list
steps.expected: Wiki page loads with list of articles
steps.actual: Wiki page loaded successfully showing 8 articles with sort dropdown options

steps.action: Select 'Sort by views' from the dropdown
steps.expected: Articles are sorted by view count
steps.actual: Sort by views option selected successfully, URL updated to include sort=views parameter, articles list refreshed

test_scenarios.scenario_name: View count display on article view

steps.action: Click on article 'Published Article Test' to view article detail page
steps.expected: Article detail page loads with view count displayed
steps.actual: 404 Error Page displayed - 'Sorry, the page you are looking for cannot be found'

steps.action: Try clicking on 'Test Article with Special Chars' article
steps.expected: Article detail page loads with view count visible
steps.actual: 404 Error Page displayed - all article links result in 404 errors

issues: All wiki article links result in 404 errors when clicked, preventing verification of view count display on article detail page
Code in Article.ascx shows view count display at lines 71-73: ArticleInfo.ViewCount with 'View'/'Views' label, but cannot be tested due to 404 errors

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Increment view count on article view

steps.action: Attempt to view an article to trigger view count increment
steps.expected: Article page loads and view count is incremented
steps.actual: Cannot test - all article detail pages return 404 errors

issues: Cannot test view count increment because article detail pages are not accessible (404 errors)
Code in ArticleContent.ascx.cs line 185 shows: ArticleController.Instance.IncreaseViewCount() is called when article is viewed, but cannot verify this functionality due to broken article URLs

observations: Code review confirms view tracking functionality exists: ArticleController.cs:186-189 has IncreaseViewCount method
Article.ascx displays ViewCount at lines 71-73 in normal view and lines 161-162 in mobile view
ArticleContent.ascx.cs line 185 calls IncreaseViewCount when article is loaded
Sort by views functionality works at the list level (confirmed via UI)
Database stored procedure Wiki_Article_UpdateViewCount increments ViewCount field
All article detail URLs return 404 errors, which may be a URL routing or configuration issue separate from view tracking
The view tracking feature appears to be implemented correctly in code, but testing is blocked by article page 404 errors
